answers.answer: 24 weeks and 3 days pregnant here! Feeling good overall. I pee every ten minutes during the night it seems like. LOL! Baby Ava does kick me everyday, but she's not super active all the time...a little in the morning, a tiny bit in the afternoon and a little activity again before bed. I do wish she would be more active right now!I did a glucose test early in pregnancy - do you think I will have to do one again?
most likely they will have another one done between 22 and 28 weeks because there is pregnancy induced diabetes as well

question: just giving an update on my bump. :) back pain started kicking in alot more and with me having that extra vertabrae and already in pain its just escalating it lol the rib pain has eased up a bit and im grateful for that!! it does come and go though. she's very active lately and is always moving around saying hello :) next doc app is the 31 of jan. i have the glucose test that day :( ugh. what about you ladies
title: 25 weeks  and 4 days pregnant.
